about_the_game:
Do you want to complete Bara Giants getting all short paths of the game? Also, want all images in HD resolution?


This DLC contains a guide with all the detailed information you need to complete the whole game. Also, it contains scenes of the game (SFW + NSFW). In other words, by buying this DLC, you'll get:

  • Scenes and H-Scenes in the original resolution;
  • A folder with almost 40 sketches from the development process;
  • A PDF document with the backstage of the game including sketches from the h-scenes, characters' art process, and much more!;
  • A PDF document detailing the whole content of the game;

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Bara Giants\Adult Art Pack + Guide

content_descriptors.notes: Bara GIants Adult Art Pack + Guide contains partial and full nudity, explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal).
